tag_list: php, xhtml, css, javascript, xcode, objective-c, social, network, kazle, youmeo, developer, application, habbo, aggregate, iphone, interest
overview:
Nick Babenko is a general Application Developer, with many skills. He first started his Internet development in his early teens, creating and managing an extremely successful Habbo Hotel fansite. During that time, learning many skills such as; PHP, XHTML, CSS and Javascript later on learning even more languages; Actionscript, Java and Objective-C.

Nick’s career as a professional developer started at youmeo.com, in Coventry, United Kingdom in 2008, after being their for around 6 months, it faded out and he started his own Social Network Aggregator, Kazle along with Shane Rounce and working for Mikael Vinding, still going strong, during development on Kazle is where he started his Objective-C (Xcode) development, creating iPhone applications. Also, during his time at Kazle took more of an interest in Interface Design, using his skills on Kazle and it’s iPhone application.

Nick’s worked on a lot of fairly small projects, festival websites, online shops, interactive multi-user chat rooms. He’s also always looking for new skills to learn and projects to embark on.
